title: Jessica Mauboy and rumoured fiancée Themeli Magripilis are spotted after 'engagement' news
text:
Jessica Mauboy apparently got engaged to her long-term partner Themeli Magripilis while on holiday in Kalymnos, Greece last month.

And on Tuesday, the couple looked as loved-up as ever as they arrived home from their trip at Sydney International airport.

Spotted for the first time since reports of their engagement broke, the singer was positively radiant as she beamed a wide grin alongside her rumoured fiancée.

They couldn't be happier! Jessica Mauboy and rumoured fiancée Themeli Magripilis are spotted for the first time in Sydney after 'engagement announcement' in Greece

According to Woman's Day magazine, Themeli proposed to girlfriend-of-10-years Jessica on Greece's Palionisos Beach with a diamond ring.

The We Got Love hit-maker, 30, is yet to make the announcement official and kept her hands hidden from view as she left the airport terminal.

Despite wearing a sparkler on her ring finger during photos from her romantic trip overseas, Jessica appeared to keep it hidden in her camel-coloured coat's pockets.

Suddenly shy? The We Got Love hit-maker, 30, is yet to make the announcement official and kept her hands hidden from view as she left the airport terminal

With Jessica's hands buried in her jacket, Themeli took on the task of pushing all three of their matching luggage bags towards their car.

The Darwin-born star followed close behind her soccer player beau, concealing her eyes with a large pair of stylish shades.

Despite the long-haul flight, Jessica looked effortlessly chic in a white T-shirt, blue jeans and crisp-white sneakers.

She also added to her glam look by styling her ombré locks in relaxed waves.

Love looks good on her! Despite the long-haul flight, Jessica looked effortlessly chic in a white T-shirt, blue jeans and crisp-white sneakers

Themeli reportedly sought approval from his family in Greece before asking Jessica to marry him on their holiday.

The Sapphires star met the Northern Territory-based soccer player on a cheeky night out more than 10 years ago, and continued a long-distance relationship with the soccer player for seven years.

The pair ended their long-distance romance and moved in together in Jessica's $1.8 million two-level Sydney apartment in 2016.

In 2017, the musician told WHO magazine that she was excited for their future together.

'I love the idea of having children with Themeli. I love the idea of being married to him. We already kind of are,' she said at the time.
description: Jessica Mauboy apparently got engaged to her long-term partner Themeli Magripilis while on holiday in Kalymnos, Greece last month.
authors: Candice Jackson For Daily Mail Australia
